headline: Shopify Subscription App
description:
introducing Subify; our third app that has been launched in Shopify AppStore.

It's a monumental day for us and we are honored to announce that Subify, our new app, is released. During the past few months, we have been working really hard to build Subify, and we believe that it will help Shopify merchants build a better subscription experience for their customers and increase their recurring revenue. You can install our app directly from the Shopify App Store or from the link below. https://apps.shopify.com/subify?st_source=ycombinator
description_zh-Hans: 这是我们的一个重要日子，我们很荣幸地宣布，我们的新应用程序Subify已经发布。 在过去的几个月里，我们一直在努力打造Subify，我们相信它将帮助Shopify商家为他们的客户建立一个更好的订阅体验，并增加他们的经常性收入。 你可以直接从Shopify应用商店或从以下链接安装我们的应用程序。 https://apps.shopify.com/subify?st_source=ycombinator
description_zh-Hant: 這是我們的一個重要日子，我們很榮幸地宣佈，我們的新應用程序Subify已經發布。 在過去的幾個月裡，我們一直在努力打造Subify，我們相信它將幫助Shopify商家為他們的客戶建立一個更好的訂閱體驗，並增加他們的經常性收入。 你可以直接從Shopify應用商店或從以下鏈接安裝我們的應用程序。 https://apps.shopify.com/subify?st_source=ycombinator
